codes.code: from engine.engine_template import EngineTemplatepkglineflagfrom wifuxlogger import WifuxLogger as LOGpkglineflagfrom esp32 import raw_temperature as tempfuncpkglineflagdef run(cmds):pkglineflag    exec("{}({})".format(cmds[1],EngineTemplate.exec_formatter_api(cmds)))pkglineflagpkglineflagdef get(cmds):pkglineflag    tf = tempfunc()pkglineflag    tc = (tf-32.0)/1.8pkglineflag    LOG.info("T = {0:4d} deg F or {1:5.1f}  deg C".format(tf,tc))pkglineflag
